pages.text: We are not alone; or at least we don't have to be.

If I arrange my Reagents correct - I will need a greater amount of Focal Power for this - and call upon the Black Goat, I could - possibly - enlighten other fools; however, I should get them under the effect of $(marked)Mania$() first, though I already know a Rite that may help me with that. Still, success is not guaranteed.
